# (PART) Continuum-mechanics-type equations {-}

# Optimal heat transfer {#ch:Heat}

## Motivations
Heat transfer is important in both daily life and the industry.
Almost everyone in the United States has either an air-conditioner or a heater;
nuclear plants and data centers 
need sophisticated heat transfer systems to stay cool.

## Mathematical background
The main tools for our analysis come from probability.
In this section, I will re-call some standard facts that are essential to our understanding of the problem.
